articles.content: Former CSK captain MS Dhoni has been in incredible form this season, smashing bowlers all around the park at an unbelievable rate of 260. Thala, as his fans fondly call him, has scored 91 runs in eig… [+1892 chars]

articles.author: Karishma Pranav Bhavsar
articles.title: Scam alert! Fraudster impersonates MS Dhoni to con cricket fans | Mint - Mint
articles.description: A scammer impersonating MS Dhoni asked a fan on Instagram to transfer  ₹600 via PhonePe, claiming to be stranded in Ranchi without a wallet.
articles.content: With cricket fever on the rise and a large number of MS Dhoni fans online, it's important to be aware of a scam circulating on social media. Taking advantage of the cricket trend, scammers are posing… [+1909 chars]

articles.author: icc
articles.title: 'Victory speaks volumes': Vanuatu coach hails team after shock triumph - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Vanuatu women's coach Joshua Rasu has led the praises of his team following their momentous win over Zimbabwe at the ICC Women's T20 World Cup Qualifier.
articles.content:
His side's premier all-rounder, Rasu pointed to the spirit of women's skipper Solman, an all-rounder herself, who has led of the team's push both on and off the field.
It's been an incredible journe… [+536 chars]
